meanings.definition: The quality or state of being uneven.
meanings.sent1: The unevennesses of the road made it difficult to ride a bike.
meanings.sent2: The painter tried to fix the unevennesses on the wall before starting to paint.
meanings.sent3: The unevennesses in the sidewalk caused many people to trip and stumble.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions showed an unevennesses that made it hard to predict her reactions.
meanings.sent5: The unevennesses of the terrain made it a challenging hike.

meanings.sent1: The unevennesses in the color of the wall paint were quite noticeable.

meanings.sent3: The unevennesses in his excuses made it clear he was not telling the truth.
